about_the_game:
In this free warm-up version of Bämeräng, you can already familiarize yourself with the art of boomerang throwing, which awaits you in the full game.

Experience fast-paced boomerang duells, set in an outlandish, colorful world. Master the flight curve of the boomerang to hit your friends in unexpected ways and send them flying off the stage.

What are you waiting for? Grab a friend for some action packed fun and please the almighty goddess with your mad boomerang throwing skills.

Master the flight curve of the boomerang

Learn to anticipate the trajectory of the boomerangs to dodge your opponent's throws and hit them from unexpected angles.


Win the favor of the goddess

The almighty green goddess declares as the winner whoever collects the most golden points on the stage. Don’t fall off the platform or the goddess will shake those precious points out of you.


Exciting matches

Steal those precious points from your opponents by landing your boomerang throws and throwing them off the platform. But beware, the more points you have, the more you can lose, making it easy for your opponents to catch up.

AND ONCE YOU'RE ALL WARMED-UP, CHECK OUT THE FULL GAME, FEATURING:

Over 20 map variations

Adapt to the changing surface of the platform. Take cover behind obstacles and throw your opponents into holes in the map.


Free for all mayhem or team mode

Engage in intense 1v1 duels, or fill your whole couch with a 4-player free for all or team game.

Matches over multiple rounds

The green goddess will change the platform after each round as it rises towards the sky, where the winner can look forward to be celebrated by the goddess herself.

More unique soundtracks

Get into the boomerang fighting groove with 3 handcrafted soundtracks!
